abstract: Fuzzy planar graph is a very important subclass of fuzzy graph. In this paper, two types of edges are mentioned for fuzzy graphs, namely effective edges and considerable edges. Also, a comparative study between Kuratowskiâ€™s graphs and fuzzy planar graph is made. A new concept of strong fuzzy planar graph is introduced. Some related results are established. These results have certain applications in subway tunnels, routes, oil/gas pipelines representation, etc. It is also shown that an image can be represented by a fuzzy planar graph and contraction of such image can be made with the help of fuzzy planar graph.
